verificationProcess.description: Our platform meticulously collects and checks all required information, going beyond simple data gathering. We conduct detailed assessments including detection of historical deforestation, verification of polygon quality, identification of overlaps with Protected Areas, and comprehensive checks on compliance with local regulations for both farmers and plots.

applications.title: Mobile Application
applications.subtitle: Field data collection made simple
applications.description: Our mobile application revolutionizes data collection for natural rubber processing factories in Sri Lanka. Designed with an intuitive interface, the application enables straightforward information gathering directly from farmers. Recognizing the challenges of working in remote plantation areas, we have engineered the application to function seamlessly offline.

applications.title: Web Dashboard
applications.subtitle: Comprehensive data management
applications.description: The RubberWay web dashboard serves as a powerful data management and compliance tool specifically designed for Sri Lankan rubber processing facilities. It aggregates all required information, providing a centralized platform for comprehensive data oversight. Compliance checks run seamlessly, allowing users to quickly identify and address potential issues.
